page.title: 06 BRIXHAM RUGBY CLUB
page.content: The Rugby Club is at the top of Rae Barn Hill. It was founded in 1889. There is a Social Club with four bars and a lounge and is open to the public. I go to train for Rugby on Thursdays. We play rugby against other villages and towns like Dartmouth, Torquay & Paignton. We also play other teams which are on tour. We have played five different teams from Wales and many others from outside Devon. There are quite a few different age groups, they range from under 12's through to the F troop. The under 12's play 11 a side and the 14's and over play rugby league which is 15 a side. There is a first team and a second team which play matches quite often. The club is very good, the third best in England and is very well supported.
